[short] skip

# test with -fullpath
! go test ./x/... -fullpath
stdout '^ +.+/gopath/src/x/fullpath/fullpath_test.go:8: test failed'
# test with -test.fullpath
! go test ./x/... -test.fullpath
stdout '^ +/.+/x/fullpath/fullpath_test.go:8: test failed'

-- go.mod --
module example
-- x/fullpath/fullpath_test.go --
package fullpath_test

import (
	"testing"
)

func TestFullPath(t *testing.T) {
	t.Error("test failed")
}
